name: United States Property Coin
description: USPC is a cryptocurrency that represents fractional ownership in a real estate portfolio in the United States. We combined the best features of blockchain tech with real estate, allowing for liquidity that traditional real estate has never seen before, while still remaining decentralized. Domestic and international Token holders would benefit from current income, and long-term appreciation of real estate assets, along with the ability to trade freely. USPC represents the next stage in the evolution of real estate investing.
